title: Need a club to play games with
body:
Hey guys, I've been playing this game for about a week now.  I'm seeing a lot of potential in this game, so I thought I might get more involved into the community.  Does anyone know of an active club that recruits new members? 

Feel free to comment below or add me in game @ Mr Kn0x

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: The problem is that you're on NA...
Why are you posting this on the Oce forums?
